## Data Privacy

Just because you don't put your name on something does not necessarily make you unidentifiable.

example: course evaluation sheets might identify you given the other information you provide.

## Hypothesis Generation vs. Confirmation

Your Turn 1

Hypothesis generation/exploration is much more flexible, allowing us to explore many questions of interest while hypothesis confirmation is much more focused on answering one and only one specific question of interest.
